runs.comm: starts off with a length delivery on the stumps, pushed to mid-off
in the zone outside off stump, Ouma tries to drive on the up and is beaten
Vaas traps him in front. It landed on a length, on the middle stump line and straightened and beat the intended defensive prod. Ouma's bat came across the line and played all over the delivery
full and outside off, slanting away from him, Sangakkara gathers
shaves past the off stump. Short in length, angling away from the batsman who tries an ugly swipe across the line
length delivery on the leg stump line, Odhiambo tries to swat it across the line and it strikes him on the thigh pad.
length delivery that buzzes through the corridor outside off, he thinks about playing a shot but withdraws the bat at the last minute
cuts in off a length, tries to glance and the ball runs off the pad
full, straight, on the middle, defended on the front foot
bangs it in, past the left shoulder and he ducks under
slashed over the slips. Full and outside off, he freed his arms at the width offered and slices it over the slip
attempted yorker ends up as a low full toss, glanced past square leg
here comes another bouncer. It climbs over the batsman and the 'keeper
charges down the track, stays adjacent to fullish delivery and drives it between the bowler and mid-off
full and outside off, he attempts to slog it across the line but the bat meets thin air
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed towards mid-off for a quick single
full-pitched, on the off and middle, angling away, Obuya tries to whip it across the line, gets a outside edge and the ball flies past a diving Mahela at first slip
They continue to slog across the line and continue to miss. He takes a step down the track and can't connect with his pull shot
The timber is disturbed. Another wild slog across the line and the fullish delivery squeezes past the flashing blade and crashes into the off stump
homing in on the off stump, defended on the front foot
kicks up from short of length, outside the off stump, holds its line and teases the outside edge
length delivery on the off stump line, pushed to left of mid-off
bangs it in short and it slips down the leg-side
peach of a delivery. Again kicks up from short of length and beats the bat.
goes for the yorker as a variation but it slips down the leg-side
back to short of length, on the off stump line, defended to the off side
off cutter, on the middle and leg, pushed to the on side
lands on a length, just outside the off stump, straightens a touch, jabbed away at the last minute. Cramped for room.
beauty. This one goes the other way and he is comprehensively beaten
the fuller one and hint of swing in, trying to trap him lbw, the bat-face shuts as it comes down and he ends up squeezing it to midwicket
Out of the blue. Against the run of play, comes a stunning on the up hit over long-on. He took a couple of steps down the track and heaved a length delivery over wide long-on.
lands on a length, on the middle stump line, curves in a touch, worked tto right of midwicket
lands on a length, on the middle and nips back in to crash into the inner thigh. Ouch. Obuya goes down in pain.
short in length, on the off stump line, guided to backward point
hits the short of length, just outside off stump, steered to point
on the middle stump line, short in length, goes back to work it past square leg
lands on a length, jags back in to beat the intended defensive stroke and crashes it into the thigh pad
full in length, well outside the off stump, left alone
beaten. Snarls up from a length,  holds its line outside the off stump and beats the lame poke
length delivery bouncing over leg stump, a slog across the line is attempted but no wood on leather
fullish, swinging outside leg stump and Mishra is struck on the pad
full again, on the off and middle again, swung to left of long leg
full again, almost at the blokchole, on the off stump, stabbed down the track
swinging delivery on the legs, flicked to deep square leg
attempted yorker, on the middle and leg, driven to long-on
floated outside leg stump, reverse swept to backward point
on the leg and middle, driven to long-on
lands on the off stump, spins past the defensive blade
full and on the middle, driven to extra cover
slow through the air, on the middle stump, defended on the front foot
again slow through the air, on the middle stump line, tapped to the off side
starts off with a slow off cutter, tapped gently to the on side
here comes the yorker - 85.2 mph - squeezed out to cover.  The bat came down at the very last minute
85.8 mph, gunning for the toe, he manages to shuffle outside the line and squirt it to the on side
bouncer, on the middle stump line, pulled weakly to square leg. No one there and he survives.
87.7 mph bouncer and Mishra ducks under .
slower one, short in length, on the off stump line, Mishra waits on the ball before steering it to third man
flighted delivery, turning away from Mishra who tries to slog-sweep it but makes no conact. The feet is on the line as the bails come off. It is refered upstairs and the verdict is OUT.
leans forward to push to cover
floated on the off stump, steered to short third man
flighted outside off, driven to sweeper cover
really slow through the air, on the off stump, even slower cut shot past point
on the leg and middle, swept past square leg
Fullish, outside the off stump, a loose drive is attempted and the outside edge flies low  - boot high - to Mahela at first slip who catches it cleanly. Very well taken.
full and on the legs, flicked past square leg
bouncer but going down the leg-side
off cutter on a length, it stopped on the batsman who ended up stabbing at it and the ball lobs back to Malinga
yorker, dug out to square leg
on the off stump line, driven to deep cover
floated outside off stump, swept to midwicket
fuller, flatter, on the middle and leg, whipped to deep midwicket
short in length, on the off stump line, punched to long-off
really really slow through the air, landed on the leg stump and spun past the bat
faster, fuller,straighter, jabbed away to the off side. Good variation from Jayasuriya, who seems to be really enjoying his bowling.
banged in short, climbs chest-high and flies over the off and middle line
slower one and it goes past the wild slog and just over the middle stump
another slower one but he picked it up really well and lofted it cleanly over mid-on. Very well played
on the hips, tucked past square leg
full, on the off stump line, again stops on the batsman who manages to scoop it over the bowler
slow off cutter - he has been bowling quite a few of them, punched to cover
from round the stumps, leg spin, lands outside leg stump, swept past square leg
short in length, turning past the off stump, cut to deep point
dipping on the yorker length, squirted out to cover
short, on the stumps, swatted to long-on
round-armish action, lands outside leg, padded away
on the off stump line, short in length, cut to deep point
yorker length, swings in late, driven through the on side
full again, chopped through the off side field

yorker length again, on the leg and middle line, squeezed out with the help of a inside edge to short fine leg. Obanda calls for a run and rushes across but Obuya stays rooted - it was Obanda's call as it went behind the wicket - and Obanda is run out as both end up at the same end.
another yorker - all the four deliveries have been on and around that blockhole - dug out back to the bowler
a slower one this time, punched past the bowler
another one just in front of the blockhole, on the off and middle line, stabbed away to cover
from round the stumps, round-armish delivery, outside leg stump and padded away
on the leg stump line, defended down the track
a tad short, outside off stump, tapped to backward point
fuller, driven to right of long-off
long-hop and carted to the deep midwicket boundary
tossed-up, on the off stump line, he comes down the track and drives to Fernando at long-on
here comes that fullish almost-yorker length again, outside off stump, chopped to extra cover
yorker squeezing under the bat and through the zone outside the off stump
slower one, fisted through the off side
another yorker length, square driven to deep point
full again, whipped to Mahela at midwicket
outside the off stump, lapped to short fine leg
on the middle and off, turned to left of midwicket
stumped. Slow through the air, lobbed outside off stump and it went on straight. Obanda jumped out and missed his big heave
on the middle stump line, worked to the on side
full and outside off, goes on straight and he is beaten trying to cut late
fullish, on the middle stump line, driven to long-on
dead plumb. Yorker-length again, on the middle, the bat went across the line and is trapped in front
yorker length, on the middle stump line, dug out to the off side
fullish, on the off stump line, driven to long-off
another one really full in length - really extrordinary this, apart from iirc three slower ones, everything from him has been almost at the blockhole length- on the off stump, driven to long-off
fullish, on the leg stump, worked through the on side
on the off stump line, swung to long-on

That's it, it's all over.  Tossed-up, on the middle stump line, tries a slog-sweep but ends up ballooning it to cover. Since Odoyo will not bat  - absent hurt - Sri Lanka have wrapped up a massive victory
